thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 17 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-ATS Automation Tooling Systems Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share Of C$0.16

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-ATS Automation Tooling Systems Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share Of C$0.16
text:
May 17 (Reuters) - ATS Automation Tooling Systems Inc :
* ATS REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND ANNUAL FISCAL 2018 RESULTS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE C$0.16 * Q4 REVENUE C$298.4 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW C$268.5 MILLION
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW C$0.16 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* AT MARCH 31, 2018, ORDER BACKLOG WAS A RECORD $746 MILLION, 10% HIGHER THAN AT MARCH 31, 2017
* Q4 ORDER BOOKINGS WERE $348 MILLION, AN 8% INCREASE FROM Q4 OF FISCAL 2017
* Q4 ADJUSTED BASIC EARNINGS PER SHARE WERE 22 CENTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
